messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] What does this Tang say?
messages.msgSnippet: I believe that is signed Hishu Kaga Ju Yoshitsugu. It s not a WW2 sword, it is probably a shinto sword in WW2 mounts. Rich ... -- *Richard Turner - Nihonto
messages.messageBody:
I believe that is signed Hishu Kaga Ju Yoshitsugu. It's not a WW2 sword,
it is probably a shinto sword in WW2 mounts.

Rich

messages.subject: What does this Tang say?
messages.msgSnippet: I just posted photos of the inscription on the Tang of my sword. What does it say and what does it tell about the sword? The photos are in a new album call
messages.messageBody:
I just posted photos of the inscription on the Tang of my sword. What
does it say and what does it tell about the sword?

The photos are in a new album call WWII Tang Inscription.

Thanks!
